general.name: Emmanuel Mweemba
general.headline: Front-end developer
about: I'm Emmanuel Mweemba, a passionate web developer who transforms ideas into clean, functional, and responsive websites.
I focus on writing efficient code, creating seamless user experiences, and staying up to date with the latest web technologies.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.description: Developed and optimized backend APIs at Gnamma Technologies using Node.js and Express, ensuring efficient data flow and secure integrations.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.description: Spearheaded the development of responsive web applications at Code Savanna using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, enhancing user engagement and performance.

experiences.title: Social Media Manager
experiences.description: I created and managed digital content across multiple platforms to boost brand visability and engagemeents,also developed marketing campaigns and tracked perfomance analytics.

experiences.title: Speaker Manager
experiences.description: As a Speaker Manager, I coordinated and managed event speakers ,handling communication and scheduling ,to ensure smooth event execution and professional presentation.

projects.name: cloude's Budget Bites
projects.description: A simple two-column portfolio template that is easy and quick to customize for your own purposes. Mobile friendly.
